statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.Email , AA.PhoneNo , AA.MobileNo , AA.FaxNo , AA.AddressID
FROM dbo.TBillingAddress AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID#
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TBillingAddress AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBillingAddress ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, Email, PhoneNo, MobileNo, FaxNo, AddressID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #Email#, #PhoneNo#, #MobileNo#, #FaxNo#, #AddressID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBillingAddress SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , Email = #Email# , PhoneNo = #PhoneNo# , MobileNo = #MobileNo# , FaxNo = #FaxNo# , AddressID = #AddressID# WHERE ID = #ID#
